name: 2024 the 5th International Conference on Mechanical and Aerospace Systems
content: Paper Publication: All submitted papers will be peer-reviewed by technical committee and reviewers of the conference. Accepted full papers will be published in ICMAS 2024 Conference Proceedings, and will be submitted for indexing to ISI/CPCI (Web of Science), Scopus, EI Compendex, Inspec (IET), Google Scholar, CAS, DOAJ, ProQuest, Zentrablatt, EBSCO etc.
